definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
State Administration for Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television (SAPPRFT)/abbr. to 廣電總局|广电总局[Guang3 dian4 Zong3 ju2]
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Xin1 wen2 Chu1 ban3 Guang3 dian4 Zong3 ju2
containing_words.word: 國家新聞出版廣電總局

definition: State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television (SAPPRFT), est. 2013 (abbr. for 國家新聞出版廣電總局|国家新闻出版广电总局[Guo2 jia1 Xin1 wen2 Chu1 ban3 Guang3 dian4 Zong3 ju2])/(prior to 2013) State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television (SARFT)

sentences.english: This system has been developed successfully and is used by many broadcast television network companies.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已研製成功並應用在多家廣電網絡公司。

sentences.english: The last part is about the effects after the framework works.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分爲廣電集團組織結構改革後的運行效果。

sentences.english: Broadcasting network and telecom network have similar techno-economical features.
sentences.chinese: 廣電網絡與電信網絡具有相似的技術經濟特性。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the billing system between the mobile net and the broadcast and television net.
sentences.chinese: 探討了移動網與廣電網通信中的付費系統。

sentences.english: Shanghai Minhang Radio & TV Technology Development.
sentences.chinese: 上海閔行廣電科技發展有限公司。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhao said he never considered registering the film with the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, also known as Sarft, the main regulator and censor of films.
sentences.chinese: 他說根本沒考慮過拿電影去廣電總局送審。

sentences.english: Liu Chenghua was appointed Director of the Department of Culture, Radio, Film, TV, Press and Publication of Jinan.
sentences.chinese: 任命劉程華爲濟南市文化廣電新聞出版局局長。

sentences.english: It is not the first time that SARFT has made an eccentric ruling.
sentences.chinese: 這並非廣電總局第一次作此怪異的規定。

sentences.english: Cartoons co-produced by domestic and foreign producers will have to get approval first.
sentences.chinese: 中外合拍動畫片在這一時段播出，需報廣電總局批准。

sentences.english: Satellite Division, Department of Science & Technology, SARFT.
sentences.chinese: 國家廣電總局科技司衛星處。

sentences.english: After digitalized, broadcasting networks get rich in resources.
sentences.chinese: 電視數字化以後，廣電網絡資源得到豐富。

sentences.english: Entering 21st century, the broadcast & TV industry have started the tide of grouping in China.
sentences.chinese: 進入新世紀以來，我國廣電業掀起集團化的浪潮。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduced information management system of integrated service in Wjjin.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹了武進廣電綜合業務信息管理系統。

sentences.english: To carry out the diversity of value-added services is one of the core strategies of Broadcasting business model.
sentences.chinese: 開展多元化的增值業務是廣電模式的核心策略之一。

sentences.english: The Chinese regulatory agency, known as Sarft, didn't respond to requests for comment.
sentences.chinese: 廣電總局沒有迴應置評要求。

sentences.english: Ericsson is looking forward to meet the challenges and win the future together with Cable & Media customers.
sentences.chinese: 愛立信希望和廣電客戶一起攜手迎接挑戰，同創未來。

to belong to (a category)/to be attached to
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
